root.info: Interface preferences for the Siren redescription mining tool.

parameter.name: nb_folds
parameter.label: Nb folds
parameter.legend: Number of parts the data should be split into.

parameter.name: coo_dim
parameter.label: Strips direction
parameter.legend: Coordinate to cut the strips along (-1 and -2 for cut along longitudes and latitudes, respectively).

parameter.name: grain
parameter.label: Granularity
parameter.legend: Granularity of the cut (lower means narrower strips).
